short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a Git branch name based on Jira task using the ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Git Branch Name Generator extension allows you to automatically and swiftly create Git branch names. Leveraging Jira tasks, it harnesses the potential of the ChatGPT to craft branch names that are cohesive and relevant to your projects. Simplify your workflow by generating precise branch names that seamlessly tie back to Jira tasks, streamlining your development process.

Key Features:

-Generate Git branch names from Jira tasks
-Utilize the ChatGPT API's power to generate cohesive names
-Optimize your workflow with descriptive, contextual branch names
